colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (CES BLA MA MCHOD PA’I CHO GA ‘DI NI ‘DUL BA ‘DZIN PA CHOS KYI GRAGS PA DANG, BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS @011A *, ,GNYIS KYIS ‘DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS CES YANG YANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH’AKYA’I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GRUB CHEN GLING GIS MDZAD PA’I BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG, SPANG LO CHEN POS MDZAD PA’I BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG, SA SKYA PA‘I DGE BA’I BSHES GNYEN DU MAS MDZAD PA’I BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE ‘DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA’I BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG, MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO MKHAN PO’I NA PO CHE SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA’I BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG, GZHANG YANG GRUB MTHA’ SO SO’I BLA MA MCHOG DMAN DU MAS MDZAD PA’I BLA MA MCHOD PA MANG PO ZHIG MTHONG ZHING BRJOD BYA’I DON RNAMS YOD DU CHUD PAR BYAS TE, LEGS PA’I CHA THAMS CAD LEGS PAR BSDUS NAS, MDO RGYUD DAM PA’I MAN NGAG JI LTA BA BZHIN DU TSIG SBYOR SPANGS TE GO BDE BAR, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO’I GZIMS KHANG RGYAL MTSANG MTHON PO’I YANG THOG TU SBYAR BA’O,, ,,) , ,`THUB DBANG RDO RJE ‘CHANG DANG TZONG KHA PA, ,YID LA GANG ‘DOD DNGOS GRUB MA LUS PA, ,’BEBS MDZAD RTZA BRGYUD BLA MA’I TSOGS RNAMS DANG, ,PHYAG DRUG MGON PO LA SOGS BSTAN BSRUNG GIS, ,’DI PYI’I LEGS TSOGS THAMS CAD GCIG CAR DU, ,LEGS PAR ‘GRUB PAR BYED PA’I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,SRID ZHI’I RNAM DKAR JI SNYED DGE MTSAN GYIS, ,DENG ‘DIR MI SHIS GDUNG BA KUN BRAL ZHING, ,GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG DGE LEGS NAM MKHA’I MDZOD, ,’PHUN TSOGS DPAL LA ROL BA’I BKRA SHIS SHOG, ,,)
